title: Distribution characteristics of soil microplastics and their impact on soil physicochemical properties in agricultural areas of the North China plain
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1556-1570
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00242C, Paper
Yuze Zhou, Ming Dou, Yan Zhang, Kaizi Ning, Yuxuan Li
A novel image recognition method based on fluorescence staining was proposed for the batch analysis of microplastics (MPs), and the impact of MPs on soil physicochemical properties was analyzed and evaluated.
